titles.title: I will not sleep unril I find

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not sleep unril I find
dwelling places for the Mighty One

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let us go to Him
Let us worship Him
Arise, oh Lord (X2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For you have chosen Zion
Land of your desire
Resting place forever
